title: Circularly Polarized Antennas
description:
2014 | ISBN: 111837441X | English | 322 pages | PDF | 16 MB

This book presents a comprehensive insight into the design techniques for different types of CP antenna elements and arrays

In this book, the authors address a broad range of topics on circularly polarized CP antennas. 

Firstly, it introduces to the reader basic principles, design techniques and characteristics of various types of CP antennas, such as CP patch antennas, CP helix antennas, quadrifilar helix antennas QHA, printed quadrifilar helix antennas PQHA spiral antenna, CP slot antennas, CP dielectric resonator antennas, loop antennas, crossed dipoles, monopoles and CP horns.
